figures.name: Revenue
figures.description: Total revenue, net sales, turnover - the total income from all sources before any expenses are deducted

figures.name: Investments
figures.description: All expenses related to developing the company, building capacity etc. Not running costs.

figures.name: Ongoing Operating Expenses
figures.description: Total costs, expenses, cost of goods sold, operating expenses - all expenses incurred in running the business excluding investments

figures.name: Profit
figures.description: Net profit, net income, profit after tax - the final profit figure after all expenses, taxes, and costs have been deducted.

figures.name: Funding raised
figures.description: All cumulative funding combined until now. No loans.
